Name: Wind Turbine Scada Dataset
Summary: 2018 Scada Data of a Wind Turbine in Turkey.

Sections.Title: Dataset Information
Sections.Content: In Wind Turbines, Scada Systems measure and save data's like wind speed, wind direction, generated power etc. for 10 minutes intervals. This file was taken from a wind turbine's scada system that is working and generating power in Turkey.
